streams.application_prompt: Stop thinking. Where do you feel the tension of this problem in your body?
streams.name: Somatic & Sensory
streams.principle: Use the body as a data instrument.

streams.application_prompt: What specific expectation was violated to make you notice this?
streams.name: Diagnostic & Analytical
streams.principle: Identify the deviation from the norm.

streams.application_prompt: If you had to draw a box around this problem, what is inside and what is outside?
streams.name: Structural & Framing

streams.application_prompt: Who will be most affected by this inquiry, and are they in the room?
streams.name: Relational & Ethical

streams.application_prompt: What is the 'burning platform' or curiosity that makes waiting impossible?
streams.name: Kinetic & Initiating

streams.application_prompt: Locate the project. What is the specific gap in the existing landscape (literature, market, history) that this work fills?
streams.name: Navigational & Contextual

streams.application_prompt: Define the box. What are the non-negotiable constraints (time, budget, physics) that define 'Done'?
streams.name: Boundary & Constraint

streams.application_prompt: Travel to the future. The project has failed. What specific variable caused the collapse? (Pre-Mortem)
streams.name: Simulation & Risk

streams.application_prompt: Check the compass. Does this specific plan actually deliver on the core promise defined in Tool 1?
streams.name: Foundational & Strategic

streams.application_prompt: Force the volume. Generate 10 'bad' or 'illegal' ideas in the next 2 minutes. Do not filter.
streams.name: Expansive & Divergent

streams.application_prompt: Force a collision. How would a biologist / musician / chef solve this specific logistics problem?
streams.name: Combinatorial & Associative

streams.application_prompt: Lower the stakes. What is a rule we are currently following that we can explicitly break right now?
streams.name: Environmental & Affective

streams.application_prompt: Disengage. Stop trying to solve it. Sit in silence for 5 minutes or take a walk. What comes up unbidden?
streams.name: Emergent & Receptive

streams.application_prompt: Stop debating opinions. If we could only pick one metric (ROI, Reach, Speed) to judge this, what would it be?
streams.name: Evaluative & Metric

streams.application_prompt: Are we actively choosing this path, or just letting it happen by default? Who is signing their name to this?
streams.name: Volitional & Agentic

streams.application_prompt: Strategy is sacrifice. What is the 'good' idea we must explicitly kill today to let the 'great' idea live?
streams.name: Subtractive & Sacrificial

streams.application_prompt: Does this choice align with who we claim to be? Is this decision reversible if we are wrong?
streams.name: Aligned & Ethical

streams.application_prompt: Deconstruct the big goal. What are the Parent, Child, and Sibling tasks? Draw the tree.
streams.name: Hierarchical & Logical

streams.application_prompt: If this plan were a movie, what is the opening scene, the climax, and the resolution? Map the timeline.
streams.name: Narrative & Sequential

streams.application_prompt: Decouple the parts. How do Component A and Component B talk to each other? Define the 'API' between them.
streams.name: Systemic & Modular

streams.application_prompt: Check your state. Is the challenge level matching your skill level right now? If not, adjust the constraint.
streams.name: Somatic & Attentional

streams.application_prompt: Stop simulating. Build a rough physical model or write a messy draft of this idea right now.
streams.name: Material & Enactive

streams.application_prompt: Overcome static friction. What is the absolute smallest micro-step we can take in the next 2 minutes?
streams.name: Kinetic & Temporal

streams.application_prompt: Listen to the friction. What is the material (or the market) telling you right now that the plan didn't predict?
streams.name: Iterative & Adaptive

streams.application_prompt: Don't just fix the error. Ask 'Why?' five times to find the systemic flaw that allowed the error to happen.
streams.name: Diagnostic & Causal

streams.application_prompt: Treat the critic as a sensor. Read the feedback again, assuming it is 100% accurate. What do you see now?
streams.name: Social & Receptive

streams.application_prompt: Audit your reaction. Are you rejecting this data because it is wrong, or because it threatens your ego (Cognitive Distortion)?
streams.name: Metacognitive & Internal

streams.application_prompt: Look at the split-test or the rubric. How does the actual result compare to the predicted result? Quantify the gap.
streams.name: Empirical & Comparative

streams.application_prompt: Translation check: If you had to explain the value of this to a 5-year-old (or a busy executive), how would you frame it?
streams.name: Rhetorical & Narrative

streams.application_prompt: Power check: Who holds the authority to validate this work, and what specific values or rituals do they respect?
streams.name: Political & Social

streams.application_prompt: Defense check: What is the weakest part of your argument, and what evidence do you have to shore it up?
streams.name: Verificational & Evidentiary

streams.application_prompt: Action check: The presentation is over. What is the specific 'Ask' or physical next step you need from the audience?
streams.name: Transactional & Outcome

streams.application_prompt: Lift up from the details. This specific thing happened-what is the universal principle or pattern behind it that applies elsewhere?
streams.name: Abstractive & Theoretical

streams.application_prompt: Don't just share wisdom. Write a checklist, template, or script so someone else could do this task without you.
streams.name: Codifying & Practical

streams.application_prompt: Who owns this now? Define the maintenance plan. How do we store this so it is accessible and useful in 5 years?
streams.name: Stewardship & Temporal

streams.application_prompt: What do we need to celebrate, mourn, or let go of so we can enter the next project with a clean slate?
streams.name: Closure & Integrative

streams.application_prompt: Zoom out. Don't look at the tasks; look at the energy. Is the team spinning, flowing, or grinding? What Cynefin domain are we actually in?
streams.name: Sensing & Diagnostic

streams.application_prompt: If the process is broken, don't just push harder. Change the rule. Do we need to tighten the constraints (convergence) or loosen them (divergence)?
streams.name: Regulatory & Interventionist

streams.application_prompt: Check the soil. Is there an unspoken conflict, a lack of safety, or a power dynamic that is blocking the work? Address the human layer first.
streams.name: Cultural & Relational

streams.application_prompt: North Star check. Look at our current trajectory. If we keep doing exactly what we are doing, will we actually hit the strategic goal?
streams.name: Strategic & Directional

_metadata.description: Maps the core cognitive streams. Tool 1 (Genesis) has 5 streams; Tool 5 (Structure) has 3 streams; all others have 4 streams.
